articles.title: Texas has a new abortion pill law. But one Mass.-based provider plans to keep shipping them there.
articles.description:
Angel Foster, who runs Massachusetts-based The MAP, which prescribes the regimen of pills to women in every state, said her organization will keep sending pills to women in Texas.
